title: A guide to eternity extracted out of the writings of the Holy Fathers and ancient philosophers / written originally in Latine by John Bona ; and now done into English by Roger L'Estrange, Esq.
author: Bona, Giovanni, 1609-1674.
notes: Added engraved t.p. by F.H. van Hove.
